channel.title: -Important-
channel.description: If i download a server , with clan wars , and i want to put it in my server , where do i find the code for clan wars in what folder/file ? and where do i put it in my server files ? thank you if you help me :) , also someone please tell me how to put a altar in the bank , in my server , its a pking server , and i don't know where the file will be to locate where to add a altar Thank You , Regards Joe

item.title: -Important-
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

That’s called leeching, and nobody is going to help you do it.

Read full topic
